message.content:
1. A study was undertaken.
2. The study was conducted in the present.
3. The study was related to Thalassemic patients.
4. The aim of the study was to improve the quality of life of Thalassemic patients.

messages.content:
Statement: The present study was under taken with a hope to prevail better quality of life to the Thalassemic patients.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
